notifications.subject: Congratulations to the best class ever!
notifications.text:
Hi 1A's parents,
I want to congratulate with you and your sons because they're are the best class we've ever seen at the back2school institute!!

Regards,
The headmaster.

notifications.subject: Congratulations for the best class ever!
notifications.text:
Hi 1A's teachers,
I want to congratulate with you because results of the 1A class are amazing!
Good job! Please keep on teaching in this way.

Regards,
The headmaster.

notifications.subject: Holidays period announcement
notifications.text:
Hello everybody,
I would to announce you that during the whole month of june 2018 lectures will be suspended.

Have good vacations

Regards,
The headmaster.

notifications.subject: Bad behaviour of your son!
notifications.text:
Hi Mr. Bob,
I writing you because we're having many troubles due to your son behaviour... please just come to catch him up.

Regards,
The headmaster.

notifications.subject: Call for too many absences
notifications.text:
Hi Mr. Carl,
I would like to meet you to discuss about your continuous absences to the classes!
Let's meet this Thursday at 9:00 AM.

Regards,
The headmaster.
